definition: excerpt/selection (from a book)/to select/to choose an extract
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: InfoQ brings you an  exclusive pdf chapter excerpt from this new book.
sentences.chinese: InfoQ为您独家带来本书的章节节选。

sentences.english: Here's a selection of her photographs.
sentences.chinese: 下面节选一些杨娜的摄影作品。

sentences.english: The text excerpts from the first two is fiction.
sentences.chinese: 课文节选的是小说的前两节。

sentences.english: Excerpts from the interview were posted on the BBC Web site Monday.
sentences.chinese: 这次访谈的节选段于周一上传到BBC的网站上。

sentences.english: This is an excerpt from For All the Tea in China: How England Stole the World’s Favorite Drink and Changed History by Sarah Rose.
sentences.chinese: 本文节选自萨拉罗斯所著的《为了中国的那些茶》。

sentences.english: I recently read an excerpt from her manuscript, which starts with her personal journey.
sentences.chinese: 我最近读到她书稿的一个节选，从她的个人经历开始。

sentences.english: He will list books he is reading and post emails and excerpts from  presentations.
sentences.chinese: 他将会列出自己正在看的书，贴出电邮和演讲节选。

sentences.english: This blog post is part of a special National Geographic News series on global water issues.
sentences.chinese: 此博客节选自国家地理新闻系列特刊的全球水话题。

sentences.english: The book publishes excerpts from the writing of about 100 essayists, from all corners of Asia.
sentences.chinese: 书中节选了来自亚洲各地约100名作者的文章。

sentences.english: Excerpted from "Land of the Lost Souls" by Cadillac Man.
sentences.chinese: 节选自《幽魂之地》，作者凯迪拉克超人。

sentences.english: But maybe he can just give away the sampling, for non-commercial use.
sentences.chinese: 但是可能他会放弃非商业用途的节选版权。

sentences.english: Below are excerpts from that interview.
sentences.chinese: 以下是采访内容的节选。

sentences.english: Excerpted from chapter 11 of Theory and History.
sentences.chinese: 节选自《理论和历史》第十一章。

sentences.english: Here are a few of the comments excerpted from the book
sentences.chinese: 以下是从书中节选的一些结论。

sentences.english: From an interview with Chinachem Charitable Foundation lawyer, Keith M. K. Ho.
sentences.chinese: 以下是就遗嘱检验中风水因素对双方律师的采访节选。

sentences.english: These are all extracts from the long poem.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是从那长诗中节选的。

definition: start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
for the benefit of the reader
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference
